website_summaries.verdict: A unique shelf style that adds character to any space and can be used for organization or display.
pros: Owners say that these shelves are surprisingly sturdy, and are easy to put together and install
We love that they offer a unique and distinctive look and can be used in virtually any room
cons: Some users felt that once the shelves were assembled they were smaller than expected, and occasional consumers had issues with damaged or defective parts

customer_reviews.title: I Installed this with Velcro Command Strips (Large)
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a way to mount this without the provided screws. My wall is relatively smooth and the large Velcro strips hold up to 4lbs per set. I put 2 at the top, 2 at the bottom. That's 16lbs of holding strength so far. The shelf itself is 9lbs. I am only using this to display my POP Figures. I am not saying YOU should mount yours with the Velcro, I am just sharing what I was able to do. For safety reasons, I would suggest you use the provided mounting screws instead, especially if you are putting anything with a bit of weight onto it.
customer_reviews.author: KeLLz

customer_reviews.title: Sanganizer Corner Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Product is really nice looking. Great space saver. Easy to put together. I would put the entire thing together first, then install it on the wall. Can't store too many things on each shelf but it does the job. See pics for details
customer_reviews.author: naz

customer_reviews.title: Junky screw covers
customer_reviews.text: The shelf itself is fine, but the screws are all silver opposed to brown, espresso, or otherwise. They include enough "covers" for the screw heads, but they're trash and don't stay on whatsoever. I tossed em and just have items situated so as to expose as little of the contrasting screws as possible. I feel like screws are the same price at any color.... seems like a more reasonable solutions to just get matching screws. But hey, I'm the customer not the creator.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: ... my house and saw this modern shelf and really liked it on the pictures that they show
customer_reviews.text: Made some new changes to my house and saw this modern shelf and really liked it on the pictures that they show, I loved it even more when it was assembled and on my wall. Shipping was fast as it is with prime.No missing screws so that was a plus nothing missing or damaged only thing that I can say I didn't like was that I bought other shelves and it came in a large box with more then one item in it, well this shelve was loose in that large box while my other shelving was in its own box including the screws rolling around
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: I was a little concerned this shelf wouldn't be sturdy enough considering the price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned this shelf wouldn't be sturdy enough considering the price. But it is perfect for what I needed! Also achieved the look I wanted to have a place for my daughters DVDs! I am very pleased. Also easy to put together. I will say probably not enough for your whole movie library (I'm sure it was made for display of pretty things instead) but the shelf is alot longer than the pic here shows because it goes behind the turtle tank. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy shelf. Looks cuter in person, once you actually put it together and decorate it with your own stuff. I only got this one initially because it was tall like I needed it but could fit in a corner, otherwise I thought it was kind of ugly. It's really grown on me though, happy I got it. Kind of a pain to hang up.

customer_reviews.title: It's not solid wood but still looks great, kind of a dark walnut color
customer_reviews.text: A unique and stylish addition to any corner! It's not solid wood but still looks great, kind of a dark walnut color. Surprisingly sturdy, securely mounted it'll hold 5lbs per shelf. Assembly takes about 30 minutes if you work patiently (which I'd recommend as you don't want to strip any screw holes or gouge the laminate finish). Requires an Allen wrench (included) and takes a little hand strength but easy enough to assemble. You will need a drill to mount it to your wall via 2 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the style
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the style, but was reluctant to get it because I didn't think I had enough room. But it fits perfectly. However, I have to say that I attached mine differently. Instead of using the supplied mounting screws, I used a ton of Command Velcro strips (4 per wall contact). It works great for me. I'm guessing following the manufacturing instructions would also work great, but I cannot attest to that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the shipping
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the shipping, I arrive very fast and I love my product, without damaging the seller I suggest you use some nylon or something to separate the boards so they are not damaged, I get a scratched and I think it is not correct. Reiterated I am very happy and I just make an observation I hope is valid to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Looks fabulous, but a little troublesome to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The idea is simple, the product comes with all of the tools required to assemble. But wear gloves when utilising the allan wrench that comes with the screws, because all of the screws only have heads attuned to that wrench, and it has rather sharp edges to turn and titen. Otherwise, once you looks past that, the value of the shelf is exceptional. The end product is beautiful and sturdy, and I would buy it all over again given the opportunity, even knowing the issues with the screws. Also, it's bigger than I expected, but it's not a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I like the corner shelves but I could not place my books on it because the shelves was not large enough. I have hardcover books that would not fit. It is being used for all my other stuff I have in my bedroom. also the package of screws and the caps that cover the screws only fit the screws with the Philip head which was only two. the rest of the screws you used the allen wrench which was included. plastic caps did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette  C.

customer_reviews.title: it is a nice color and fits the corner fine
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to turn the screws with the Alan wrench. The holes were predrilled too small so if you don't have help with this, you're hands are going to hurt. Even after turning the screws as much as possible, it was still wobbly. Also very heavy so you can't hang it off dry wall. Otherwise, it is a nice color and fits the corner fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome and I love it. I needed my fiance to help me install it though because it is kind of heavy. I also needed to buy different screws because the corner of the walls are where the wood framing sits. So the anchors wouldn't go through and the screws themselves were too short to reach the wood to hold on to anything. So if you buy it be prepared to go to the store to get longer screws.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and practical shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love this little corner shelf! It looks great in my room. There’s not a ton of height between the shelves so I had to lay some of my taller books sideways but it still looks good! The shelf is pretty sturdy, was easy to put together and hang. I’m also thinking it would work as s nightstand if you have limited space in your bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: LisaN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: Our room is small and we don't have room on either side of the bed for nightstands. Searching for storage solutions for small rooms I came across this shelf. Exactly what I needed. My husband actually cut it in half and put one piece on each side of the bed. So we each have 3 shelves for phones, water, wine glasses, remotes, whatever we want!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This shelf looks great in my living room. It's perfect for showing my grandparents' artwork! It has an unbelievable amount of value for the price, very sturdy and of high quality. The only con, the plastic things to cover the screws didn't all fit. So, I used a metal Emory board to rid the excess plastic and then they were perfect. All in all, it's great! I recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great Shelving Unit
customer_reviews.text: Had my husband put it together and on the wall since he’s the resident pro at that sort of thing. It only took him about 10 minutes. I love how it looks and it’s helped clear a lot of stuff off of the bathroom sink top and from on top of the toilet, for a much cleaner more organized looking bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Barry

customer_reviews.title: This shelf looks great! I put it in a dead corner that ...
customer_reviews.text: This shelf looks great! I put it in a dead corner that I had at my house and it really spiced it up, I've gotten a lot of compliments from people visiting about how good it looks! Putting it together was a little difficult, but I did it by myself and the instructions did say to have two people building it, so I guess that's on me!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ruedy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but set up is annoying!
customer_reviews.text: It looks super nice and all was going well with set up, until my extender fell through my wall! Actually mounting this product is in general is hard (Two person job I did alone)! Second they don't give you a spare expendor so your kinda out of luck if it breaks (or falls through the wall like mine did maybe have spares yourself) or something! It's quite heavy so I'm worried it will fall and is not secure enough since I'm an extensor short! But it does look really nice and is great quality! If you don't mind an annoying set up process get it! The look does pay off at the end! I used it for my pops!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Rose

customer_reviews.title: You might have to drill in your own holes
customer_reviews.text: I didn't actually set this up myself, luckily my boyfriend did it. He has his own tools which came in handy because apparently he had to drill some of the holes in himself. There Other wholes did not align with the place for the screws. Its a decent product but I am starting to think it was overpriced for the quality. It looks good but make sure you are patient when putting it together!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble !
customer_reviews.text: Came in a small box with all 6 square boards, 5 half circle boards, screws (had extra), black screw covers (you can put over the metal screws to hide them), and a small Allen wrench. It was easy to assemble and must admit pretty easy to hang on the wall as well. The design makes it a unique modern looking shelf. I love it ! Might even get a second one and use it as a decorative shelf this time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.text: It got a little tiring putting the shelf together but overall not too bad. Took about 25 minutes maybe? Fairly easy to hang, I needed the help of a friend to position it right where I wanted. I'd about how sturdy it is as I haven't quite decided what to put on them for decor :/ but I do like the shelves so far!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my vanity area!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product for the price! It’s good quality and very easy to install. It comes with all of the hardware needed. It was literally perfect for my vanity area. I’d recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with no instructions, but it's straightforward to assemble. The shelf space is pretty small, but good for smaller items like small picture frames, figures, or knick-knacks. Looks quite nice
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love this Shelf!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is great! It's easy to put together, and looks great in the corner! It doesn't take up too much space while still being big enough for a succulent, or candles, etc. I'm tempted to buy another, I'm just not sure where to put it yet.
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a while and it’s really nice to have old family pictures easier to see. I like seeing a bit of balance to the room. Easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Juno Carmella

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but requires work
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice from a distance. Up close you can see the screws attachments. Comes in a zillion pieces so it’s like putting a puzzle together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price and great product
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it! I got it for my teenage son’s room and it looks great! I’m thinking of ordering one or two more for other rooms. I highly recommend these shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Huff

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Well made wood parts. Assembly was challenging due to alan wrench tool provided. Kept dropping the stupid thing what’s wrong with Phillips head screws? Once assembled, sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Waa easy to put together. I wish the spacing in between was bigger but plenty of little knickknacks fit on it. I have it on my babies nursery so his little items fit well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but assembly issues
customer_reviews.text: Assembly of the shelf was very easy until I got to the last screw. There wasn’t a pre-drilled hole and the screws are flat so I had to drill it out first. Also disappointed with the screw head caps, half of them didn’t fit properly and wouldn’t stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ott

customer_reviews.title: Worked absolutely perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Worked absolutely perfect for my needs. This shelf was super easy to put together and even easier to hang on the wall. The spacing between the shelves is a fair distance (perfect for my needs) with the top one being open for bigger items if needed. Overall, this shelf worked perfect for me and I may get more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie and Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, exactly like shown!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The quality, delivery quickness, and most importantly the products price. Very easy to put together, and the weight withstands perfectly for any wall type! I'm very likely to continue purchasing products from this company through Amazon. Sorry guys but Amazon is the bomb.com!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christalline Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sized anchors
customer_reviews.text: Decent shelves, but the drywall anchors provided were the wrong size for the screws provided. Now I have a hole too big in my drywall to put the shelves where I wanted to and a small patch job to do.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on wall, installation is poor.
customer_reviews.text: It looks pretty good on the wall but the wall mount/anchors are not very good. Instructions could be better. It basically just has picture of a hammer and the anchor on the wall. I wouldn't recommend hammering the anchor into your wall.
customer_reviews.author: SonnieSlim1

customer_reviews.title: Easy do it your self project that looks great!
customer_reviews.text: These shelves just fit an awkward area in my older home. They look great and were so easy to assemble. I used two since I had two corners right together and now I can display some of my decorations and family pictures. Thank you for such a welcome fix to a decor problem I have had for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Love this shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this shelf. I wasn't sure how I would feel about a corner shelf. But once it was up and holding pictures I love it. Its heavy when put together so it took 2 of us to hang in the corner. My honey said it was super simple to put together. Very happy with this purchase and will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great looking piece!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this shelf!!! It's super easy to put together and looks amazing once hung. Makes a wonderful accent piece and great for knick knacks, books and we even have a flameless candle on it. I would recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reaves

customer_reviews.title: Looks great & is perfect for displaying those precious momentos & ...
customer_reviews.text: The most inefficient use of space in any room is the corner & this product utilizes that. And handsomely I might add. Looks great & is perfect for displaying those precious momentos & knick knacks we all have. Modest size is great for any size bedroom or living room. Even works well in the kitchen & bathroom. Every home should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Practical and cool design
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Hanging on the wall needs a team effort. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shay A.

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome looking bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome looking bookshelf. Shelves are a little short for some of the books I have, but I can fit a lot of other stuff on it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: I really love this. My room is really small and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. My room is really small and I don't have any extra room for a nightstand, so this was perfect. It's heavy though, so make sure that the corner you put it in has studs to support it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to understand measurements. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute- a bit smaller than you may imagine. I got this with small books in mind, and even small books cannot be stacked usually, and rather must be laid atop each level. Nonetheless, it's cute
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: My grandson thinks it looks "cool"
customer_reviews.text: Just the ticket if you want to display some things and have the shelf itself make a statement,even empty. It's a real attention getter. Easy to assemble and mount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to do
customer_reviews.text: My hubby just put it up. I assembled it. Really easy to do. Love how it looks and Fast Sipping, recommend to fam. and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Wen L

customer_reviews.title: The wood is a much better quality then some other shelves I've gotten
customer_reviews.text: The wood is a much better quality then some other shelves I've gotten. Very sturdy and easy to put together although some of the little nubs to hide the screw heads were not included so I couldn't hide them all.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Wornson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful corner shelf. We wanted something that would not take up that much space in the washroom and this was great! I love how easy it was to install
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like picture
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this purchase. Was very excited to receive it as I was expecting it to look just like it does in the picture, a nice dark wood color finish and rectangle shaped shelves. Neither were true for the pieces we received. The pieces were more of a cherry wood color and square, not rectangle. Returned without even setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Fahad Jawed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. The box it comes in is really small! And it came inside a larger box. The little screw cap covers are cheap. About 50% won't even go into screw heads. This is NOT a big shelf by any means. Choose your items to place on it wisely.
customer_reviews.author: Elli

customer_reviews.title: ... the shelves were a little further apart but looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Wish the shelves were a little further apart but looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4me

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and installation. You will need to pre-drill the wall before installation, but otherwise no drill required for assembly of the shelf itself. Nice knick-knack shelf for my office.
customer_reviews.author: MFWalkerJr

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect thing I needed to fill in the empty corner above my rabbits cage. And it holds my little things perfectly. It was so easy to put it together. I put it together and hung it by myself. I am thinking about buy another one for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, and all the pieces fit perfectly flush with each other. You do need 2 people to mount it, to get it done right, but once you get it up, it looks awesome. Just like the picture, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Akriti Srivastava

customer_reviews.title: Cute but takes a while to put together
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is cute installed but it was horrible to put together. The hex key killed my hand because of how it goes together, you can’t twist in a spin.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this corner shelf
customer_reviews.text: I really like this corner shelf. it wasn't that hard to put together either. I put it together by myself. it looks so nice in my living room..i plan on purchasing another one. i would recommend this to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. I ordered two of these and made them connect into one, for a 9 shelf unit. Only caveat is to go easy on tightening. One can overtighten, so just make them good and snug. Excellent look and a very good value!
customer_reviews.author: Harold Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great value and aesthetics
customer_reviews.text: VERY easy to put together and mount. VERY sturdy VERY gorgeous looking! I'm extremely happy with this purchase. I've been eyeing a corner shelf for quite a while, and at this price point I couldn't resist. Perfect for the dudes little knick-knacks :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessa Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great asset to a room! Good value for price!
customer_reviews.text: Still holding up! I bought this product months ago, and I’m still happy with its durability and aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This corner shelf looks awesome in our home. It was easy to put together. My only complaint is that main support screws to hold it to the wall were smaller that I would like. I swapped them out for a bigger sturdy bolt/screw. I still may purchase another one for my home in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J Letham

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one previously and my sister liked it just like I do so I bought it for her. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great look  for my wall
customer_reviews.text: Looks really cool, great shelf to display my Star Wars collection.
customer_reviews.author: burplepatti

customer_reviews.title: Good Shelf for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For $18- this is a great shelf. While it looks great and saves space, it doesn't hold a lot. It's better for holding nick nacks than books. Overall I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price and easy to put together. As others have stated, if the screws were colored to the color of the product it would have been 5 stars for me. I used a sharpie and it helped because the screw covers it came with are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: It is unique and is a great way to show off your small collections
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments on this shelf. It is unique and is a great way to show off your small collections. Assembly was easy and the quality was better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mccall

customer_reviews.title: Adorable corner shelf
customer_reviews.text: For my daughters 12th birthday, we transitioned to a tween room. I ordered 2 of these shelves to add shelving but not overpower the room. The final product turned out so cute & she absolutely lived her room.
customer_reviews.author: Ddddonnna

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very Beautiful. Bigger then what I thought. Totally love it
customer_reviews.author: lashawnda deshields

customer_reviews.title: its a smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: the small covers for the screw holes dont stay on. But besides that its great.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.text: Very good solid only thing is that it hurts your fingers when arming it since it's this little tool but all I did was rap it with tape and it's good amazing
customer_reviews.author: Pepsi23

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it ties my whole living room together. I bought two and added on to make longer. Love love
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: these were just what I needed to add some spice to my home and they are great. They were not difficult to assemble and seem pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaniela Waeger

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Should've taken measurements for my corner, cute shelf, just looks like 12" in the picture- when it's like 8". (Story of my life, ha.)
customer_reviews.author: SpitfireBettie

customer_reviews.title: Loved them. Bought 2 more
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these originally, easy to put together and put up. Sturdy very nice, the we bought 2 more. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Icing on the cake!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to fill my empty corner of the room and this was just icing on the cake! With the right knickknacks on the shelves, this it can really make the room!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf. It looks so good in our living room my Husband said he wants to buy a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: They look great.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shelves because they fit perfect in my office where I didn’t have room to display my pictures. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Betty did not order that.

customer_reviews.title: I love this shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf ! It's beautiful and a great corner shelf ! Its very durable, beautiful color , It's not too wide where you can put a standard picture frame , but I was able to set up , candles , My wax warmer and coasters and it looks great !
customer_reviews.author: FkOff

customer_reviews.title: this was a gift so am hoping it was liked
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift so am hoping it was liked

customer_reviews.title: Some pieces were missing holes. Had to drill the ...
customer_reviews.text: Some pieces were missing holes. Had to drill the holes in myself. The curved pieces should've had 4 holes total. 3 of them only had 2.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying again!!!
customer_reviews.text: This turned out looking better that I hoped it would :)
customer_reviews.author: delaine

customer_reviews.title: Great design nice when installed
customer_reviews.text: Assembly would be much easier if a bit for drill was included. When unit is to bemounted difficult to hold and mark holes.
customer_reviews.author: Hardwareman50

customer_reviews.title: looks great. Using it for bookshelf in hallway
customer_reviews.text: Simple setup, looks great. Using it for bookshelf in hallway. The books hang off slightly from the rounded shelves. This was unexpected but actual gives it a pleasant character.
customer_reviews.author: Brandtus Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The corner shelving looks great, and love the color. This is going to be used for a shelf in my daughters room. I have not assembled it yet which is why its rated as four stars but if it’s easy, then I will update the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Leal

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! It's great quality and looks gorgeous I had to purchase another one for my daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! The quality is amazing for the amount you pay, couldn't be more simple to assemble! Super elegant yet simple! Highly recommend. Keep in mind the shelves are very small so you can't use it for anything much bigger than what I have on mine. The picture frame is a frame for a 4x6 photo and is very snug horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin E.

customer_reviews.title: Same as the first time I purchased almost 5 yrs ago
customer_reviews.text: As this is the second time I purchased this product I'm highly satisfied with it as well as the eas of putting it up and together, lots of compliments received on the overall look in my home .
customer_reviews.author: norman e cookson

customer_reviews.title: Very Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Great shelves. They were easy to assemble, though I did use a drill to make the holes in the wall, as where I am living has plaster walls. I didn't end up needing the drywall anchors. Anyway, I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything assembled properly, and it's uneven with the wall. Also, the included anchors don't fit the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my son says they're awesome. Since they are in his room
customer_reviews.text: I say these shelves are cute, my son says they're awesome. Since they are in his room, I'll go with awesome. They are easy to put together and all pre-drilled holes matched perfectly. It's sturdy and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: j bowen

customer_reviews.title: I love the shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love the shelf, it's so pretty, but the anchors are crap. We had to go buy good ones that would actually hold it and stay in the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Molina

customer_reviews.title: Great design. Annoying to put together but not difficult
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Annoying to put together but not difficult. The screw covers are cheap and most were broken so I didn't use them. The items on the shelves cover them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: I really like this shelf
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shelf. It was simple to put together and it is a good quality. I think it looks really good in the corner of my living room. I will be buying a couple more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Decorative & stylish
customer_reviews.text: Decorative & stylish, very easy to assemble & install, only drawback is it can only fit 5x7 picture frame. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: E Ko Mo Mai

customer_reviews.title: Really different eye catcher
customer_reviews.text: Just moved, and everyone who comes in the house comments on it. It's a hit!. Easy to set up and hang. Biggest problem is deciding what to feature on the shelves!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: unique!
customer_reviews.text: i get alot of compliments on this corner shelf . easy to install & great quality!
customer_reviews.author: GAZ

customer_reviews.title: FITS PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a shelf in this corner, but could never find one to accommodate the light switch. This cute little shelf fits the bill perfectly! Easy To assemble and a great price to boot!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: rubyred161

customer_reviews.title: ... is very cute in the corner and is quite sturdy. Took a good 30 minutes to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is very cute in the corner and is quite sturdy. Took a good 30 minutes to assemble, but all the tools, supplies were included.
customer_reviews.author: DFARMER70

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the stylish looks of this book shelve.
customer_reviews.author: Benhappy

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together was like doing Chinese arithmetic but it's nice
customer_reviews.author: ronnecea

customer_reviews.title: Great decorative shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf. It was very easy to put together (instructions states you need two people but I was able to do it alone, easily), and it's very sturdy. I've gotten lots of complement on the piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product, though a bit cheap in quality (pressed board). Comes with all hardware needed but I added glue for extra strength. It does work.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Satterly
